website_summaries.verdict: Rugged 110 x 38 millimeter steel pegs (2) in black, with textured surface.
pros: Sturdy, durable construction, made of steel
Peg can be used for bike tricks or to accommodate a passenger
Fits a 3/8-inch axle with 24 threads per inch
Textured surface provides a good grip
cons: They are larger and heavier than some purchasers expected

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these, and so do I. They were very easy to install and they make his bike look a lot cooler than before. They’re easy for other kids to stand on while they ride around, have nice textured surfaces for grip, and the paint is holding up well despite all the abuse we put them through.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Stripped & Screwed
customer_reviews.text: I can not in good conscious recommend this product because the set I received was defective and maybe previously used and returned as they are no good. They kept falling off and the inside thread felt like they were completely stripped because they do not tighten. In this condition they are not safe and I strongly feel someone will get seriously hurt. I will have to let Amazon know.
customer_reviews.author: Tony G

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: These are solid and support my weight (185lbs) as well as the weight of any of my kids, who like to ride standing on the rear axle of my mountain bike. Makes for great tricks, multiple riders, and good times! I take my kid to school on my bike using this and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Rampant Online Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Could use instructions
customer_reviews.text: These work great! I got them for my son's bike because my daughter keeps wanting to ride with him so having some pegs for her to use helps both of them. They didn't come with any instructions so I used some of the other reviews as my instructions on how to install. I had to remove the nuts that were originally on the axle and screw these on instead because our bolt was not long enough. However, with the use of a screwdriver I was able to get them quite tight. Overall I am quite happy with them, however, I do wish they came with instructions of some kind.
customer_reviews.author: Riesiel

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!
customer_reviews.text: These things almost killed my daughter. They never seemed to tighten up, no matter how much I torqued them down. Then they would back off the threads and loosen the wheel on my kids beach cruiser, causing her chain to pop off. If you’ve ever ridden a bike with a coaster brake, you would know that once you lose your chain you lose your breaks. She then ate sh!t going downhill on a busy street.
customer_reviews.author: B. Treloar

customer_reviews.title: solid sturdy simple cheap
customer_reviews.text: simple enough. take one nut off the axel tighten this one on. use a screw driver, stick it in the hole and crank it down. bought for my 8 yr old son, but of course i had to play too. they hold my 200 lb self up just fine and my son became the envy of the block. will buy again
customer_reviews.author: paul biltz

customer_reviews.title: LARGE & made of strong steel
customer_reviews.text: These are really great! LARGE & made of strong steel. I used them on my Trailmaster MB200 (mini bike). I had to modify a bit by drilling the tread hole larger so the bolt would fit through. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Osburn

customer_reviews.title: good axle pegs.
customer_reviews.text: I put these on my son's bike so he can tote a friend around at the local park. He loves them! They went on easily. Note; they are kinda larger than I thought they'd be- and quite heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Debra A Glaze

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Bike Handles
customer_reviews.text: These work okay, my teen put them on his bike and they wore out after several months of daily riding. They held up for a good portion of riding.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Cleary

customer_reviews.title: Boys love the ! Super easy to put on.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to attach. Literally just screw then on. Had to remove a screw from 1 of our boys bikes to get the peg on, but all the others were really simple. Boys love them!
customer_reviews.author: Stay717

customer_reviews.title: the hole on one of the pegs was not dead center - not very important but annoying
customer_reviews.text: looks very strong, the hole on one of the pegs was not dead center - not very important but annoying
customer_reviews.author: avi

customer_reviews.title: Good value for pegs
customer_reviews.text: Good addition to your bike to have a rider stand in. Basic pegs for basic use. Good value
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: Stock pegs were garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Used as replacement pegs / frame sliders for my DRZ-400SM. Stock pegs were garbage.
customer_reviews.author: khaoticscorpion

customer_reviews.title: These are great pegs, although they didn't fit my son's small ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great pegs, although they didn't fit my son's small bicycle axle. Good quality for the price though, we'll hang onto them until he upgrades to a larger bike that they will fit :)
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D

customer_reviews.title: Only 2 pegs
customer_reviews.text: Amazing pegs, I was disappointed to find that you only get 2 pegs and not four because i was expecting to find four to have a full set. Otherwise amazing purchase and product
customer_reviews.author: Ashton H.

customer_reviews.title: These suck
customer_reviews.text: They didnt fit you would think they would be universal or at least come with some kinda adaptable piece
customer_reviews.author: michael w.

customer_reviews.title: Defective?
customer_reviews.text: I tried putting this on my “Throne The Goon” BMX bike and when I try putting on the peg, it screws in a little but not all the way in (both pegs) to the point where it’s suppose to be. I’m 100% sure I got the right size b/c my rear axle is 3/8
customer_reviews.author: Robin J.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them, and the price was right for quality steel
customer_reviews.author: Dmoney

customer_reviews.title: Great pegs!
customer_reviews.text: These pegs look sharp & were super easy & quick to add to my child’s bike.
customer_reviews.author: ct79

customer_reviews.title: Fits front
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the back wheels but only fits front
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Millington

customer_reviews.title: Every kid needs pegs on their bike!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son's new bike after being annoyed with the construction of another pair. This pair is excellent, screws directly onto the axle and has holes to put something through to give you the torque to get them on tightly (I used a long screwdriver). Fast and easy installation, and my son loves them! Make sure you get the right size for your bicycle axle.
customer_reviews.author: m3ng

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: These must be made of cheap pot steel or something. The thread inserts were misaligned and stripped immediately. I could never install them...
customer_reviews.author: FuzzyBones

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and well built
customer_reviews.text: These work perfectly on my son’s Specialized Hotwalk balance bike! Allows me to ride along and push while he sits on the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: son loves them!
customer_reviews.text: perfect fit for my son's bike. Easy to install and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Although i bought these for a completely different purpose, they were exactly what i needed for my project.
customer_reviews.author: BINOBINOBINO

customer_reviews.title: Not for scooter.
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered these for a scooter but when they arrived they were actually the size for a bicycle. Put them on my son's bike instead. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: wahoo a peg that is heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Solid product I weigh over 200 lbs and pegs did not bend or break
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pegs
customer_reviews.text: These foot pegs are the most durable pegs I've ever owned or seen. I bought a couple more because they are so good.
customer_reviews.author: RockDoc

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: definitely goof quality and description is exactly what you get!
customer_reviews.author: T. SHOEMAKER

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pegs for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pegs for the money. Very satisfied. Make sure you have a long enough wheel stud to mount these.
customer_reviews.author: Urban Knish

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these. Took me all of 5 mins to install.
customer_reviews.author: Janay A. Lake

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pegs
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our 9 year old's birthday and they are great. Easy to install and super sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: annie p.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Threads poorly machined such that we were unable to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used on Baby Trend "Expedition" stroller
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. I put these on my Baby Trend stroller for my 4 yr old son. Threaded perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy Martinez

customer_reviews.title: As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Went on perfectly! My 8 year old loves them and they were easy to do. My daughter wants some and I am probably going to pick up another pair for her bike.
customer_reviews.author: M. Grams

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are pretty good. Biggest down side is they are heavy. I'm 170 lbs and they hold my weight.
customer_reviews.author: Scott H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loves these pegs on his bike.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Description is wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Not as advertised. These are thread pitch 26 not 24.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M.

customer_reviews.title: Makes my kids bike like he wanted
customer_reviews.text: Makes my kids bike like he wanted. He gets to do his tricks now without having to buy a new bike
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: great for having 200lbs friends on
customer_reviews.text: Fits your generic bike, great for having 200lbs friends on haha
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad

customer_reviews.title: Super Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: These held my 125 lb girlfriend 1.2 miles back to my house when her car wouldn't start. They are VERY sturdy but hollow inside. High quality and I don't think you can get a better peg. She complained that her feet curled and hurt, so maybe looking for some pedestal stand things next.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on. Works just like they are meant to.
customer_reviews.author: Craft Beer Review

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and solid
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect, made from very solid heavy duty metal. One happy teenager thanks to these.
customer_reviews.author: Angela B.

customer_reviews.title: Ventura Steel Axle Pegs
customer_reviews.text: Just what my son was wanting for his bike at half the cost of a retail store. Now he wants them for the front axle as well... We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: rrumer

customer_reviews.title: Size varies per color!
customer_reviews.text: MAKE SURE you select the proper size as the Black and the Silver are different sized fittings for the axels. Pretty solid. The only thing to consider is be careful with over-tightening. I stripped one of them while tightening with my body weight.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Tan Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: They are not being used as bicycle pegs but as highway pegs on a motorcycle on a homemade version. They look like their built well though, a little under 4 1/2"x 1 1/2" tube with 3/4 thread. Like the knurling, plus arrived a day early!
customer_reviews.author: Z.K.H.

customer_reviews.title: These pegs are perfect
customer_reviews.text: Kids enjoy a lot riding the bikes in these axles, please be sure that you select the right size, black ones are for 3/8" axles, it is the most common size in small bikes.
customer_reviews.author: FP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Highway Pegs for my Jeep Wrangler
customer_reviews.text: I used these as highway pegs for when I have the doors off my Jeep Wrangler. They work awesome. The were a little slippery because they are kind of smooth so I covered them in rubber. They are great.
customer_reviews.author: The guy who buys stuff

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, but...
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these because I could not get them on my 1952 bicycle axle bolts. Was going to turn the bike into an exercise bike and needed the pegs to do it. They were heavy duty and seemed like they would be durable, but I couldn't use them, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to install and remove so no big deal
customer_reviews.text: My daughter decided she wasn't a fan of the pegs after I installed them. It was easy to install and remove so no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Slackerstech

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: These pegs do what you want. Easy to install, strong. We have used them for a year with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel H. Reese

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks great on my sons bike after we repainted it
customer_reviews.author: Team Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Works, and good product fast delivery. Fits our beach cruiser bike.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great Footpegs. Good Quality. Good Price.
customer_reviews.text: I added a passenger seat on the rear rack on my bicycle. Bought these as foot-rest pegs. They fit great and the black matches my bike. They have a grip texture which helps keep feet on the pegs. I paired it with these two items:
customer_reviews.author: SmallTownMusicTeacher

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product...
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made product and very easy to install. We installed these on bike. My son loves them.
customer_reviews.author: OB07TN

customer_reviews.title: Eh okay
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they looked like they were rough and well they are but not too far from smooth. The hole is also not centered so you get crooked pegs. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: its was a good buy, a bit smaller then expected but it works.
customer_reviews.author: kyalo

customer_reviews.title: It is just a peg!
customer_reviews.text: It is just a pair of pegs, nice looking. Cannot say much about it. I guess worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Rana

customer_reviews.title: Not for my purpose.
customer_reviews.text: I know it is used for trick bikes, but I thought it could also be used as foot rests for my e-bike. Unfortunately my shins didn't like them when they keep bumping into them.
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Blauh!
customer_reviews.text: Blah! don't even think about buying this piece of scrap metal!
customer_reviews.author: philip k.

customer_reviews.title: Used as Foot Pegs for Jeep Wrangler
customer_reviews.text: These worked great with a combination of eye-bolts and washers to be foot pegs in the door hinge of my Jeep Wrangler for when the doors are off. Makes for a comfortable ride around town or on the highway!
customer_reviews.author: Gov875

customer_reviews.title: They only fit the front wheel nut
customer_reviews.text: The begs are cool but for some reason they only fit the front wheel. The back wheel has larger bolts? Recommendations?
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Not scooter pegs
customer_reviews.text: these are not scooter pegs there bike pegs its so lame that they are under scooter pegs waste of time
customer_reviews.author: IreneM

customer_reviews.title: Good set of pegs
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and they are holding up well good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.author: hillbilly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Seller
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time in excellent quality, would definitely buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Lopez

product_meta.title: Novatec Steel Pegs for 3/8 inch axles
product_meta.description:
The Novatec Steel Black Peg threads securely onto any 3/8 inch axle and the textured surface grips tight. Novatec Pegs last. Go ahead, beat them up.

BRAND_DESCRIPTION
The Novatec Steel Black Peg threads securely onto any 3/8 of an inch axle and the textured surface grips tight.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
